name: Media Streamer
short_description:
Media streamer is a free media player that allows you to watch Movies,TV shows, and Music videos and more right from your computer. Media streamer contains a database of  over 40,000 top movie titles ,5000 TV shows and over 1,000,000 music  videos and short clips  you will never run out of content to watch media streamers database is updated daily. Watch any Movie, TV Show, or music video with media streamer free media player.

System Requirements ____________________________________________________________________________________ Microsoft .net framework 4.0 or above, Internet Explorer 7.0 or above, Windows XP, Windows Vista,  Windows 7, A Graphics Card That supports screen resolution of 1280X768, A Minimum of 1GB Ram, 
Please make sure your computer meets these requirements before downloading this software or software may not function properly.
summary: Free media player that streams Movies,TV shows,and Music videos
